delete from scm_allot where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select allot.`id` AS id, allot.`allot_code` AS allotCode, allotUser.`user_id` AS allotUser, allotUser.`name` AS allotUserName, allot.`allot_time` AS allotTime, dica.id AS auditSign, dica.name AS auditSignName, auditUser.`name` AS auditorName, allot.`audit_time` AS auditTime, allot.`remark` AS remark, createUser.`name` AS createUserName, allot.`create_time` AS createTime FROM scm_allot allot LEFT JOIN sys_user allotUser ON allotUser.`user_id`=allot.`allot_user` LEFT JOIN sys_user createUser ON createUser.`user_id`=allot.`auditor` LEFT JOIN sys_user auditUser ON auditUser.`user_id`=allot.`create_by` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dica ON dica.`id` = allot.`audit_sign`
mapper.sql:
FROM scm_allot allot LEFT JOIN scm_allot_item detail ON detail.`allot_id`=allot.`id` LEFT JOIN scm_stock stock ON stock.`id`=detail.`stock_id` LEFT JOIN cus_materiel materiel ON materiel.`id`=stock.`materiel_id` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dicu ON dicu.`id` = materiel.`unit_uom` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dica ON dica.`id` = allot.`audit_sign` LEFT JOIN cus_facility_location outlo ON outlo.`id`=stock.`wareh_location` LEFT JOIN cus_facility outfac ON outfac.`id`=outlo.`facility_id` LEFT JOIN cus_facility_location inlo ON inlo.`id`=detail.`in_location` LEFT JOIN cus_facility infac ON infac.`id`=inlo.`facility_id` LEFT JOIN sys_user person ON person.`user_id`=allot.`allot_user`
AND CONCAT(CONCAT(materiel.`name`,materiel.`serial_no`),allot.`serialno`) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{fuzzySearch}),'%') AND outfac.`id` = #{outFacility} AND infac.`id` = #{inFacility} AND allot.`serialno` = #{code} AND materiel.`name` LIKE #{materielName} AND DATE_FORMAT(allot.`create_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(allot.`create_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND (allot.`allot_user` = #{userId} OR allot.`create_by` = #{userId})
